name: Talos VR (itch)
description:
Talos is a VR game, similar to a tower defence game. Player had to do spells with the hands to kill the enemies. 

We had this prototype for our university to learn oculus and vr set-up in Unity

HOW TO PLAY:

The main objective is defending the nexus, we will have a spellbook in our hand which will show us patterns to do with our hand to make magic spells to kill all the enemies that want to defeat us.
